wikipedia_page.main:
Andy Ellis (born (1984-12-15)15 December 1984), also known by the nickname of "Sniffer", is an English rugby league footballer who last played as a hooker for the York City Knights in Betfred Championship.
He is formerly of the Featherstone Rovers in the Kingstone Press Championship, and the Wakefield Trinity Wildcats in the Super League competition.

response: Andrew or Andy Ellis may refer to the following notable people:
*Andy Ellis (rugby union) (born 1984), New Zealand rugby union player
*Andy Ellis (rugby league) (born 1984), English rugby league player
*Andy Ellis (basketball) (born 1980), American basketball player previously active in the Japanese bj league
*Andy Ellis (bassist), bassist of American metal band ASG
*Andy Ellis, guitarist of the band Black Lab
Leeds Rhinos lost their first game of the season to high flying Harlequins RL, 2 tries from Quins hooker Andy Ellis won them the game, despite a strong start by Leeds Rhinos.
